intro: Orestion, commonly known as the sea holly, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its striking blue or purple flower heads, which are surrounded by spiny, leaf-like bracts. Native to coastal regions of the Mediterranean, it thrives in saline and well-drained soils. The plant typically grows to a height of 30–60 cm and blooms from late summer to autumn. Its unique appearance makes it a popular choice for rock gardens and coastal landscapes.
